mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.bank_no, b.remark, l.count, l.xjujue, l.xtongguo, l.rjujue, l.rtongguo, l.jujue, l.tongguo, l.xkexin, l.rd, l.ra, l.time FROM line AS l JOIN bank AS b ON l.bank_no = b.bank_no
SELECT b.id,b.bank_no,b.`name`,b.memo,b.rank, b.recode,b.count, b.time FROM bar AS b where b.bank_no=#{bank_no} order by b.count desc
